程序包 com.java.cuiyikai.androidbackend.mapper

接口 TokenMapper

  • @Mapper
public interface TokenMapper

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      int deleteTokenByUsername​(java.lang.String username)  
      int insertNewToken​(int userId, java.lang.String token, java.sql.Date expireTime)  
      Token queryLatestTokenByUsername​(java.lang.String username)

    • 方法详细资料

      • queryLatestTokenByUsername

        @Select("SELECT * FROM token WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM username WHERE username = #{username}) ORDER BY expireTime DESC LIMIT 1")
Token queryLatestTokenByUsername​(java.lang.String username)

      • deleteTokenByUsername

        @Delete("DELETE FROM token WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM username WHERE username = #{username})")
int deleteTokenByUsername​(java.lang.String username)

      • insertNewToken

        @Insert("INSERT INTO token (user_id, token, expireTime) VALUES (#{userId}, #{token}, #{expireTime})")
int insertNewToken​(int userId,
                   java.lang.String token,
                   java.sql.Date expireTime)

      • queryValidTokenByToken

        @Select("SELECT * FROM token WHERE token = #{token} and expireTime > NOW()")
Token queryValidTokenByToken​(java.lang.String token)

      • queryUserByToken

        @Select("SELECT * from username WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM token WHERE token = #{token} ORDER BY expireTime DESC LIMIT 1)")
User queryUserByToken​(java.lang.String token)
